pages.title: Centrifuge Heater
pages.text: Heater can make centrifuge work like Heated Centrifuge, which can process comb blocks and destroy all wax.$(br)Every centrifuge only allow $(l)one$() Heater installed. Heater needs power to work and can make centrifuge work 3 times faster.$(br)When Heater installed, centrifuge will only work when heater is powered.
